# `return` for [core](/commands/categories/core.md)

<div class='command-title'>Return early from a custom command.</div>

## Signature

```> return {flags} (return_value)```

## Parameters

 -  `return_value`: Optional value to return.


## Input/output types:

| input   | output |
| ------- | ------ |
| nothing | any    |
## Examples

Return early
```nu
> def foo [] { return }

```
